claim: Altogether, 1171 papers were scrutinised, using the inclusion criteria stated in Fig. 1, for potential inclusion in the review.
title: Fig. 1.
caption: Flow diagram of the literature search. Care home* = all long term care facilities. Dementia* = all forms of dementia see search terms in Table 1

claim: In the specific area of this review, we have considered permission in relation to hearing-related communication (see Fig. 2), but the mechanism that underpins our concept of permission may be present and ‘triggerable’ in many areas of long-term care.
title: Fig. 2.
caption: Interaction of permission with five context-mechanism-outcome configurations. The figure illustrates the central position of permission surrounded by the five context-mechanism-outcome configurations (CMOCs 1–5). The solid arrows are the relationship of permission to each CMOC. The broken lines represent the interactions between individual CMOCs. Note that most of these interactions are bi-directional
